DOC.brief_summary: The investigator propose innovative , ED-based mHealth intervention : TExT-MED ( Trial Examine Text-Based mHealth Emergency department patient Diabetes ) . TExT-MED technologically simple solution use unidirectional daily text message consist educational material , trivia question challenge promote healthy lifestyle choice reminder check blood sugar , take medication go clinic appointment . The investigator believe TExT-MED improve health outcome include blood glucose control encourage weight loss , healthy eating exercise . TExT-MED low cost , easy use quickly adapt practice environment .
